summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Fairview Avenue North, from a connection with the existing trestle at Roanoke Street to the north margin of Shelby Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 72810 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing the payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
